question: Amadou Coulibaly, who recently passed away, is the Prime Minister of which country?
explanation:
The Prime Minister of Ivory Coast, Amadou Gon Coulibaly has passed away recently, at the age of 61. 
He is also the presidential candidate of Ivory Coastâ€™s ruling party, in the upcoming Presidential elections. Due to his unprecedented death, a confusion has prevailed in the country about who will represent the party in the elections.
